TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridViewColumn extends System.Windows.DependencyObject implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public Class GridViewColumn Inherits DependencyObject Implements INotifyPropertyChanged

span.span: Represents a column that displays data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A由视图模式中将显示的数据列。A is used by the view mode to display a column of data. 实现视图模式为列提供数据。The that implements the view mode provides the data for the column. 你使用数据绑定来指定的数据。You use data binding to specify the data for the . 你可以使用属性来定义要在列中显示的数据。You can use the property to define the data to display in a column. 你还可以通过以下方式定义数据的一部分为指定属性。You can also define the data as part of a that is specified by the property. 如果不同的单元格具有不同对象，属性可以指定。If different cells have different objects, the property can specify a . 以下列表显示在这里，优先级从高到最低的顺序所述的属性：The following list shows the properties mentioned here, in their order of precedence from highest to lowest: - - - 类还包含可用于定义和自定义列标题的列的属性。The class also contains properties that you can use to define and customize the column header for the column. 属性可以定义列标头的内容。The property can define the content of the column header. 其他属性，如和还可以指定内容和列标题的样式。Other properties such as and can also specify content and style for the column header. 其中一些属性还存在于其他类如类。Some of these properties are also found on other classes such as the class. 有关用于定义样式和模板列标题，以及有关这些属性的优先顺序的信息的属性的详细信息，请参阅[GridView 列标题样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md).For more information about the properties that are used to define styles and templates for column headers, and for information about the order of precedence for these properties, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). 类实现 接口。The class implements the interface. 此接口提供的功能发生了更改属性值，如时发生的事件订阅属性值。This interface provides the ability to subscribe to the events that occur when a change occurs to a property value, such as the property value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义对象。The following example shows how to define objects for a . [!code-xaml[ListViewSnips#GridViewColumnContent](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumncontent)]

span.span: Gets the actual width of a .
The current width of the column.
The default is zero (0.0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性来获取的当前宽度时属性设置为。You can use this property to get the current width of the when the property is set to . 值为为属性指定的列大小适应不是列标题的最大可见项。A value of for the property specifies that the column size accommodate the largest visible item that is not the column header. 与不同，不是依赖项属性。Unlike , is not a dependency property.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将数据从数据源复制到某一列的类型相关联，以便列显示该类型的值的一组。The property associates a type of data from a data source to a column so that the column displays a set of values of that type. 数据源对象的示例包括对象和对象。Examples of data source objects include objects and objects. 以下属性用于定义的内容和样式列单元格，所有和优先级，从高到最低的顺序此处列出：The following properties are all used to define the content and style of a column cell, and are listed here in their order of precedence, from highest to lowest: - - - ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridviewcolumnproperties)] [!code-vb[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridviewcolumnproperties)] [!code-xaml[ListViewCode#GridViewColumnProperties](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewCode/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridviewcolumnproperties)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ Header { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 的标题的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the content of the header of a .
The object to use for the column header.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以设置为一个对象，所以只要`string`，或一个对象，它很复杂，比如具有嵌入内容。The property can be set to an object that is as simple as a `string`, or to an object that is as complex as a that has embedded content. 中的默认列标题视图模式的样式为派生自的按钮和包含的内容作为其子级的属性。The default column header in a view mode is styled as a button that is derived from and that has the content of the property as its child. 若要指定列标题的模板，请参阅或属性说明。To specify a template for the column header, see the or property descriptions. 定义内容、 布局和样式的列标题的属性会查找在许多的相关类，而且其中一些属性具有类似的功能或相同的。Properties that define the content, layout, and style of a column header are found on many related classes, and some of these properties have functionality that is similar or the same. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性和属性可以共同定义属性值和列标题内容的可视化树。The property and the property can together define property values and the visual tree for column header content. 属性还可以通过定义指定的可视化树。The property can also specify the visual tree by defining a . 定义内容、 布局和样式的列标题的属性会查找在许多相关类中，而且其中一些属性具有类似的功能或相同的。Properties that define the content, layout, and style of a column header are found in many related classes, and some of these properties have functionality that is similar or the same. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). 当你设置样式时，则某些限制。When you set a style, some restrictions apply. 有关详细信息，请参阅[样式和模板化](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md)。For more information, see the [Styling and Templating](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

summary.span: 获取或设置一个撰写字符串，该字符串指定如果 属性显示为字符串，应如何设置该属性的格式。

span.span: Gets or sets a composite string that specifies how to format the property if it is displayed as a string.

value.span: 一个撰写字符串，指定如果 属性显示为字符串，应如何设置该属性的格式。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the property if it is displayed as a string.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果， ，或属性设置，则将忽略此属性。If the , , or property is set, this property is ignored. 多个属性可用于指定列标题的格式。You can use several properties to specify the format of the column headers. 如果设置了多个属性，使用具有最高优先级的属性的值格式化列标题。If more than one property is set, the column header is formatted with the value of the property that has the highest priority. 可以在几种类型上设置列的格式。The format for a column can be set on several types. 以下列表显示可用于格式化列标题，按从低到高优先级的顺序排列的属性：The following list shows the properties that can be used to format the column headers, ordered from lowest to highest priority: - - - ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为**true**Metadata properties set to **true**|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果这两个属性和属性设置，属性优先。If both the property and the property are set, the property takes precedence. 后或为指定，不能更改。After a or is specified for a , it cannot be changed. 你还可以通过指定定义的列标题显示作为的一部分。You can also define the display of a column header by specifying a as part of a . 定义内容、 布局和样式的列标题的属性会查找在许多的相关类，而且其中一些属性具有类似的功能或相同的。Properties that define the content, layout, and style of a column header are found on many related classes, and some of these properties have functionality that is similar or the same. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [GridView 列标题的样式和模板概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md)。For more information, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/gridview-column-header-styles-and-templates-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
